name: GameDev.tv 2022 - Death is only the beginning!
name_original: GameDev.tv 2022 - Death is only the beginning!
description:
The robots are broken and attack everyone who comes near. Help Ruby to repair them.

My entry for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

SourceFiles.zip contains the source code. Some files have been removed as their licence doesn't allow distribution. There is a text file in the folders with more info.
